caption.p: Diagram showing how crop-climate modelling studies should calculate both impacts and adaptation. A1 and A2 represent a farming system under current climate with and without adaptation (respectively), whereas B1, B2, and B3 represent the farming system of A1 but under future climate with neither adaptation nor technological progress accounted for (B1), only technological progress accounted for (B2), and with both adaptation and technological progress accounted for (B3). Based on Lobell (2014).
